H3.text: what two countries make up the dominican republic. Hispaniola

A4.text: The Dominican Republic shares the island of Hispaniola with Haiti.

A5.text: The Dominican Republic is located on the Caribbean island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti.

A6.text: west of Hispaniola (Haiti and the Dominican Republic)

A7.text: Hispaniola is the island shared by Haiti and the Dominican Republic.
